name: Ollama
description: A ulauncher extension allowing you to query and interact with an Ollama instance

preferences.name: Ollama
preferences.description: Keyword to trigger the ollama extension

preferences.name: Default Model
preferences.description: Default model to use when communicating with ollama

preferences.name: Ollama Headers
preferences.description: Optional Headers to be passed on every ollama api request. Comma separated for multiple values.
